problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,点C在圆上,已知∠AOB=100°,则∠C=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, and point C is on the circle. It is known that ∠AOB = N_0, then ∠C = ()
raw_answer:
解:∵∠AOB和∠ACB是弧AB所对的角,∴∠AOB=2∠ACB,∵∠AOB=100°,∴∠ACB=50°,
故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查圆周角定理,掌握在同圆或等圆中同弧所对的圆周角是圆心角的一半是解题的关键．
